alert.note: Alert for Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 3:59PM CDT until June 05 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Brownsville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Hidalgo County in Deep South Texas... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 359 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Faysville, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Elsa, Edcouch, La Villa, Hargill, Faysville, Jose Borrego Middle School, La Blanca, Edcouch-Elsa High School, La Villa High School and Edcouch Police Department. This includes Interstate Highway 69 C between mile markers 10 and 12. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
